title: Buildout
headline: The connected CRE brokerage platform — prospecting, CRM, marketing, and transactions in one place.
description:
Buildout is a connected software platform purpose-built for commercial real estate brokerages, combining CRM, marketing automation, data-driven prospecting, and back-office deal management. Over 50,000 CRE brokers use Buildout to find, win, and close deals faster.

The platform consists of four integrated products: Prospect by Buildout for AI-powered property targeting and owner identification across 40M+ commercial properties; Showcase for automated listing marketing with AI data ingestion and native email marketing; Rethink CRM for pipeline management and lead nurturing with AI-assisted follow-up; and Transact for deal-team collaboration, document sharing, and closing workflows.

Buildout has been aggressively adding AI capabilities, including intelligent owner targeting in Prospect, automated follow-up sequences in Rethink+, AI-assisted listing creation in Showcase (including 'AL' — an AI assistant for listings), and automated data ingestion that eliminates manual property data entry. The platform is designed to scale from solo brokers to 200+ person brokerages.
short_description: Connected CRE brokerage platform — AI-powered prospecting, CRM, marketing, and deal management for 50,000+ brokers.

title: CoStar
headline: The Most Comprehensive Source of Commercial Real Estate Data & Analytics
description:
CoStar is the leading provider of commercial real estate information, analytics, and online marketplaces. The platform delivers an unparalleled depth of data covering properties, spaces, tenants, sales comparables, and market analytics across all major commercial property types. CoStar's research team of over 1,000 professionals continuously verifies and updates property information, making it the most trusted source in the industry.

CoStar serves brokers, investors, lenders, appraisers, asset managers, and corporate occupiers who need reliable market intelligence to make informed decisions. The platform includes powerful tools for property search, tenant prospecting, lease analysis, and market trend tracking. Its suite also encompasses LoopNet and Apartments.com as leading listing marketplaces.

What sets CoStar apart is the sheer scale and accuracy of its database — covering over 6 million commercial properties in the US alone — combined with analytics tools that surface actionable insights. The platform is considered essential infrastructure for commercial real estate professionals, though its premium pricing reflects its market-leading position.
short_description: The leading commercial real estate information, analytics, and online marketplace platform.

title: Dealpath
headline: The AI-Powered Operating System for Real Estate Investing
description:
Dealpath is commercial real estate's leading deal management platform, purpose-built for investment teams managing acquisitions, dispositions, development, and debt origination. The platform serves as a centralized command center where deal teams can track pipelines, execute transactions, and surface data-driven insights across the entire investment lifecycle.

Trusted by over 300 firms powering $10T+ in transactions, Dealpath combines pipeline management, AI-powered data ingestion, reporting and analytics, CRM, and deal execution workflows into a single integrated platform. Its AI Studio brings purpose-built artificial intelligence directly into investment workflows, enabling teams to screen deals in minutes, benchmark with AI-recommended comps, and automate OM and flyer data abstraction.

Dealpath stands out through its white-glove implementation approach, enterprise-grade security (SOC 2 Type 2), and deep integrations with tools like CompStak, Esri, Microsoft Office, and leading data providers. The platform is designed for collaborative deal teams of five or more, from boutique firms to institutional powerhouses like Blackstone and New York Life.
short_description: AI-powered deal management platform for commercial real estate investment teams.

title: VTS
headline: The industry's leading leasing and asset management platform, powered by 13B+ SF of CRE data and AI.
description:
VTS is the commercial real estate industry's leading technology platform, bringing together leasing, asset management, tenant experience, and market intelligence into one unified system. Used by the world's largest landlords, brokerages, and investors, VTS manages over 13 billion square feet of assets globally.

The platform consists of four core products: VTS Lease for end-to-end deal pipeline management from inquiry to renewal; VTS Market for digital marketing and virtual content delivery; VTS Data for predictive market research and investment intelligence; and VTS Activate for tenant and resident experience management across office, workplace, and multifamily properties.

VTS has recently introduced AI capabilities across the platform, including Proposal AI (creates proposals 93% faster), VTS Analyst (instant answers to market questions powered by 57B+ SF of deal data), Work Order AI (auto-converts tenant emails into work orders), and Asset Intelligence for AI-powered lease abstraction. The platform integrates with major CRE technology partners across access control, accounting, content, ESG, food & beverage, package management, payments, resource booking, property operations, SSO, and visitor management categories.
short_description: Leading CRE platform for leasing, asset management, tenant experience, and market intelligence — 13B+ SF managed globally.

title: Yardi
headline: Elevate Your Real Estate with AI-Enabled Property Management Software
description:
Yardi is the global leader in property management software, offering an AI-enabled platform that delivers seamless collaboration, smarter decision-making, and greater efficiency across entire real estate portfolios. From property management to asset and investment management, Yardi's comprehensive suite serves every segment of the real estate industry including multifamily, commercial, affordable housing, senior living, PHA, and coworking spaces.

The platform's flagship products include Yardi Voyager, a web-based integrated platform for mobile operations, leasing, analytics, and services; Yardi Breeze, a refreshingly simple property management solution for smaller portfolios; and the Investment Suite for managing the entire investment lifecycle. Yardi Virtuoso, the company's AI layer, unlocks artificial intelligence capabilities across the portfolio for workflow transformation and team empowerment.

As a privately held company founded in 1984, Yardi has grown to serve clients in over 80 countries with more than 9,000 employees worldwide. The company's single-stack approach means all products work together seamlessly, eliminating the integration headaches common with multi-vendor tech stacks. Yardi is trusted by real estate leaders of every size, from independent operators to the largest REITs and institutional investors.
short_description: The global leader in AI-enabled property management and real estate investment software.

title: Comp Crunch
headline: Export your zillow search
description:
Zillow provides users with the ability to look at tons of real estate data online which is amazing, but sometimes you need a wholistic view of the data so you can do your own analysis. 

With the Comp Crunch Chrome extension, you can easily analyze and/or export any Zillow search. This saves you time spent talking to real estate agents or laboriously copy and pasting data points into excel! We offer the ability to export your Zillow search data as either a PDF or CSV file. Additionally, we provide a quick summary of your searched area by showing the average, median, 25th percentile and 75th percentile prices of the results in your search. You also can see how sold homes have trended in an area over time.
short_description: Export your zillow search

The software provides an appraisal assignment log that tracks orders through each step of the valuation process. This ensures appraisers are informed about the status of an order. Appraisal Inbox also includes a team calendar, scheduling features, and automated reminders to help appraisers meet client deadlines and deliver appraisals on time. Additionally, the software stores all order information and work files in a secure database with daily backups, providing search and filtering capabilities.

Appraisal Inbox offers reporting tools that automatically calculate important business metrics. This helps appraisers make informed decisions by focusing on key trends. The software also makes collaboration simple, with configurable user roles and permissions, as well as automatic commission tracking.

title: Elementix
headline: Elementix is a borrower intelligence platform that lets private lenders search real estate investors by name and understand their experience, activity, and lending patterns.
description:
Elementix gives private lenders a clear view of the real people behind borrowing entities. The platform extracts signatures from county documents, connects them to mortgage records, and builds unified borrower profiles that show loans, properties, partners, and market activity. Lenders can finally search investors by name with accuracy, not guesswork.

Beyond identity resolution, Elementix delivers advanced insights that help lenders source new opportunities, monitor client behavior, and spot churn risk earlier. With enriched contact information, portfolio context, and borrower movement data across markets, Elementix becomes a single source of truth for understanding who your borrowers are and how they operate.
